message: Let's start with a generous offer. Accept and we can move on!
You were too generous, I'll take 7/10
Let's split it down the middle. It's only fair!
You want to split it down the middle? I'll offer you 3/5
I'm willing to give you a slight edge, but I'm not going to get taken advantage of!
You think you're giving me a slight edge? I'll take 55%
I'm not going to let you take the majority, but I'm willing to compromise!
Compromise? You want to split it 50/50? I'll take that
